SESSION_ID.description: Put yourr SESSION_ID here. Make sure it starts with Byte;;;, or get session id from here, https://webpair-ben-nothing.onrender.com

PUBLIC.description: Bot mode can be public, private, inbox or groups in small letters (for public true for private false)

ANTIBOT.description: Set true to Automatically deletes bot commands sent by users and warns them To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ANTILINK.description: Set true to Deletes messages containing links and warns the user To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)
